attributes.action: Removal of ALL Religious Groups/Orders from Charitable Status, and that their accounts be made public
attributes.additional_details:
To have the Charitable Status removed from all religious groups/orders, and for all said groups/orders provide detailed accounts regarding income/expenditure.
In terms of the work done helpping the homeless or starving etc other non-faith based charities are already doing this work.
The general public should be fully aware of where the religious organisations have been spending/investing money that has been raised/collected, and where it has come from.
